verses.roman:
īśvarera śrī-vigraha sac-cid-ānandākāra
se-vigrahe kaha sattva-guṇera vikāra

synonyms: īśvarera—of the Supreme Personality of Godhead; śrī-vigraha—the form; sat-cit-ānanda-ākāra—complete in eternity, cognizance and bliss; se-vigrahe—about that form of the Lord; kaha—you say; sattva-guṇera—of the quality of material goodness; vikāra—transformation.
translation: "The transcendental form of the Supreme Personality of Godhead is complete in eternity, cognizance and bliss. However, you describe this transcendental form as a product of material goodness.
